content: Mayor’s Remarks:1. Deputy Mayor Chao should convene a meeting with all concerned bureaus to clarify the competence authority of the Guosheng Lighthouse, which should join efforts with legislators to request for more funding from the central government to renovate it into a lighthouse with unique features.2. Deputy Mayor Hsu should lead the Bureau of Education to request for funding to build public sports centers, which should be combined with green care centers, so that citizens have more places for recreation.
